cause.description:
Serving Our World is a charity dedicated to providing care to orphaned and abandoned children in developing countries, with current projects in East Timor and Thailand. Providing homes that have a loving family environment as well as caring for all physical and educational needs. Our vision is to care for and work together with relatives thus helping support Families. We also provide Relief from disasters, such as the Tsunami, by building homes and giving ongoing care to reestablish the family. Our areas of relief include providing meals and education, medical clinics and preschools along with hygiene facilities.
For more information check out our website: www.servingourworld.org
